attributes.action: Cut the pence out of Benifit
attributes.additional_details: why does'nt the govenment Look at cutting out the pence in order to save monay and work to pay off the deficite. for example in working tax credit someone recives £30.47 a week and then Govenment  cut the 47p x 4 weeks = £1.48 x 12months  =£17.74 x 1,000,000 people =17,470,000 in saving = quicker reducation in deficite without realy hurting the people who claim and need Benifits.( plus banker should pay more anyway)
